column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I wanted to like this place and maybe it was because I got a personal sized pizza
column3: my pizza tasted like a microwaveable pizza. I got pepperoni and green peppers and they served it to me on a plate
column4: I wanted it in a traditional deep dish pan. First strike. Second
column6: but there was barely any cheese! Quality control check number one
column7: failed. The green peppers were huge chunks and uneven pieces
column9: failed. The one positive: the mozzarella sticks with marinara sauce were delicious
column10: hence the two stars. Service was okay
column11: but never had my drink refilled the entire time I was there. Overall
column12: never coming back here. Super bummed. :(
